data.message:
I am doing the Overnight out of darkness walk in NYC in June in honor of my son and in honor of so many lives that left too soon.  If you can send me a photo with your loved one that you want me to walk in honor of.  I would love to do a collage on the shirt I am going to wear...if you want to be included on the shirt get me a picture by email or message me brianna@thehappyturtlefoundation.org by May 15  

🐢🐢🐢

you can put their name and a quote if you would like💙 Depending on how many pictures I get will determine how big or small the picture will be on the shirt💙

The team name is #TheHappyTurtle in case anyone wants to walk as well😘

💙🐢💙🐢💙🐢💙🐢💙🐢💙🐢💙🐢💙
Please share as much as you can to get the word out.  

Lots of love,
Christian's Mommy

Christian
Forever 15💙🐢💙Forever Loved
10/9/99-7/9/15

@Christian Gibb-Trimble Memorial Page
@Madison's Rae of Hope
@The Happy Turtle Foundation
@The Happy Turtle Foundation

💙 

This is a 16-18 mile walk through NYC, every little bit helps bring light to this important cause.  American Foundation for Suicide Prevention AFSP does many things to help the community.  I have also taken their class to be able to present More than Sad:Preventing Teen Suicide and Talk Saves Lives, which are two programs that can be presented to schools and community organizations to help shed light

As a team we can end the stigma around mental illness and suicide and we can start that by showing kindness every day...you never know what journey someone may be on...if we all had empathy and compassion and treated others with kindness instead of hate, this world would become a better place.
SMILE!! You never know whose life you just may have saved💙

http://theovernight.donordrive.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=donorDrive.participant&participantID=19161
